title: (OM Orientation) Our weapons The word - Part 1
(OM Orientation) Our weapons The word - Part 2
(The Church Needs To Know) 4. Spiritual Warfare
description: Another doctrine that has crept into the Church today is that of ‘spiritual warfare’. Christians everywhere are putting emphasis on casting out demons and binding evil spirits wherever they go. If we want to live according to the sound doctrine of Christ, we need to search the Scriptures to see what is in God’s heart, and in the heart of the Apostles who wrote the Epistles.

title: Articles of Engagement for Spiritual Warfare
Authority Over Demons
description: "We cannot do anything, without Jesus we can do nothing." The bible does not have any suggestions but commandments. Corrie Ten Boom shares on the subject of spiritual warfare through her experience and the scriptures. We must have Jesus as our foundation and only support we stand on as we contend and resist the demons and the evil one in this earth.

title: Conquering Warriors
description: As Christians we must be on the offensive. The reality of spiritual war should not send us shrinking off into hiding, but motivate us to step out and reach out to others. Come fight in a war that sheds no blood, against an enemy you cannot see, and for a Commander who cannot lose.

title: Grinding in the Prison House
description: March 30, 2008 - Satan's plan for every true believer in Christ is to take away our spiritual vision and move us into a profitless labor where there is no outflow of the supernatural life. If our separation to God for the purpose of freeing others from oppression is willfully and unwittingly forfeited than we will become weak in the hands of the enemy. We are called to be separated unto God and empowered by the Spirit of God for the sake of every lost soul. If we would know the Lord's strength we must give Him our ALL and embrace HIS plan for our life.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 1 (GUARD YOUR GARDEN)
description: Satan seeks to destroy the church by attacking the Christian home.  He can wreak havoc in the church by destroying marriages and influencing the husband or wife to step out of their God ordained roles.  The basis of the home is marriage, the basis of marriage is a life long relationship, the basis of that is agreement.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 2 (HOW SATAN DESTROYS BY DIVIDING)
description: Satan seeks to destroy the church by dividing us from God and each other.  Rebellion against authority by anyone can bring destruction.  In the home the husband can lose his leadership by not loving his wife as instructed in Ephesians 5 and his wife will greatly suffer by his lack of love and the end result will be division in the home.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 3 (STRANGE FIRE)
description: Satan will seek to destroy the church by attacking leadership standards found in Scripture and tempting men and women to make their authority the guide of their actions.  It is vitally important for leaders to be under the control of the Holy Spirit.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 4 (THE WORM THAT HAD TO DIE)
description: If Satan can move us off center - which is Christ - he wins a battle in destroying the church by negating the power that is possible for our lives.  This power is found in the crucified life of Jesus Christ.  There is a beautiful analogy found in the crushing of the Scarlet Worm and the life of Christ.  Without the crushing of either one there is neither usefulness nor fulfillment.  So the Christian must follow Christ to the cross in dying to self and living the resurrected life in Christ.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 5 (THE FROG THAT COULD FLY)
description: Are our church's operating by the wisdom of the world or by God's wisdom?  Satan seeks to destroy by taking our focus off of Christ and focusing on the world's methods, wisdom, or even our own agendas or pet doctrines.  There must be a discovery in the church that true strength lies in the recognition of weakness and dependence upon Christ.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 6 (THE ROAD HOME)
description: It is impossible for two to walk together without agreement and the oneness of the Holy Spirit.  We need leaders who are led by the Holy Spirit.  Satan will seek to destroy through envy and will use a wolf spirit to undermine authority.  The qualifications of a man, used by God, are a sense of inadequacy, weakness, poor and needy, he doesn't see himself as humble but as he really is, he has total dependence on God, there is no confidence in self, and he has total reliance on the Holy Spirit.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 7 (WHO'S THE KING OF THE JUNGLE?)
description: If Satan can draw us to fight with his ways we'll lose the battle.  David fought Goliath with the weapons that God gave him, not with Saul's armor.  Satan will seek to draw us away from loving and obeying God, from prayer, and from our position of faith.  To do so will result in failure.  But we must stand strong in the Lord and believe Christ for the victory.

title: How Satan Destroys a Church - Part 8 (GOD'S GRADUATE SCHOOL)
description: Envy is a deadly root that destroys those who bite into it.  Satan will use envy to bring destruction.  Jealousy and envy will reveal to us what is in our own hearts.  There are many Biblical examples of people who were tempted with envy, Joseph's brothers, Miriam, Saul, etc.  Envy springs from covetousness and discontentment which is a statement that God is not enough for us.

title: K-476 The Powers of the Air (1 of 2)
description: Speaking from Ephesians chapter 3, Art gives an understanding of the Church’s role toward the unseen world of the principalities and powers. An early expression of this theme given in 1986.

title: K-477 The Powers of the Air (2 of 2)
description: Speaking from Ephesians chapter 3, Art gives an understanding of the Church’s role toward the unseen world of the principalities and powers. An early expression of this theme given in 1986.

title: Let us not give place to the Devil
Power Over Demons
description: [i]This recording is poor due to tape quality.[/i] In this message Corrie Ten Boom shows from the scriptures and her practical experience that we are called to have power over demons as a Christian. This message will challange you think differently then you have before.

title: Principles of the Most Holy War
Resist The Devil
description: Mark Greening shares on spiritual warfare and resisting the work of the devil in Christian life. He debunks some of the false concepts of spiritual warfare that have crept in the Church and shows how the Church has departed from scripture in this area.

title: SPIRITUAL WARFARE - Finding Reality and Balance
Soldiers
description: Preaching with great unction this brother calls the Church to righteousness and holy living. Using illustrations concerning his former life in the military, he describes the warfare we experience as Christians, and the life that we should be living. Do we realize Who it is we take orders from? Do we realize who the real enemy is? Do we understand that if we love the world we are God's enemies? Listen to this message.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 1 "The Battle"
description: Jim Logan has talked all over the world on the topic of Spiritual Warfare. He authored the book "Reclaiming Surrendered Ground" and is currently working at Biblical Restoration Ministries in Sioux City, Iowa. This 8 part series on Spiritual warfare was recorded more than 10 years ago at a J.A.R.S. conference and has been seen by hundreds of people. Jim Logan starts the conference with understanding the spiritual battle.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 2 "Resistance"
description: In the spiritual battle we have an enemy. This enemy wants to destroy us and will use everything he can to try and destroy what he can in our lives. It is important that we understand how to resist and  fight against him in the Power of God.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 3 "The Armor Of God"
description: Am I fighting against the enemy or letting him win the battle over me? As a follower of Jesus Christ it is very important as the apostle Paul says to put on the armor of God. Jim Logan takes Ephesians 6 and reveals how can I simply put on God's armor to fight the spiritual battles in my life.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 4 "Principalities And Powers"
description: Jim Logan continues the series on Spiritual Warfare with an understanding of the enemy's weapons. He will be sharing from Ephesians 6 and sharing from many encounters from all over the world. Since Satan was defeated years ago by the cross, why is it that I see him working in my life or the life of others?

title: Spiritual Warfare - 5 "Our Position In Christ"
description: One of Satan primary attacks is to attack our identity. Jim Logan explains that importance of knowing who I am in Christ. This is where the enemy attacks and wants us to focus on ourselves instead of God in us.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 6 "Manifestation Of Demons"
description: Jim Logan shares what happens when the enemy has ground in a person's life. Jim explains the authority a believer has over the enemy because of Christ. This is encouraging video to see how much POWER Christ has over the enemy, even in my personal life of temptations.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 7 "How The Enemy Attacks"
description: Do you feel like you are under attack of the enemy? Why is it when I pray it is as if I am alone? Jim Logan explains how enemy attacks believers. Knowing that the spiritual battle is in my mind, allows me the ability to CHOSE what I think about day to day.

title: Spiritual Warfare - 8 "How We Can Help Others"
description: Jim Logan concludes the Spiritual Warfare conference by sharing how we can help other people that we are in contact with every day. While the focus is not the enemy, but Jesus how can we share the JOY of Christ through our relationships.

title: Spiritual Warfare Series - Fighting Together
description: There is power when Christians come together to pray, fight and intercede. When someone is struggling and can't pray for themselves, don't criticize, but cover them in prayer.

title: Spiritual Warfare Series - Fighting With Joy
Spiritual Warfare Series - Talk To The Right Person
Spiritual Warfare Series - The Great Privilege
Spiritual Warfare Series - Why Must We Fight?
Spiritual Warfare: Questions and Answers
description: This is a question and answer session at the 'Harvey Cedars Conference' Stephen Kaung and other speakers respond. The question and answer session ran longer than the tape that it was originally recorded on. Therefore, the recording of the session presented here is missing the last portion of the session.

title: Standing on the Wrong Side of the Battle
description: October 14, 2007 - Whenever the people of God move away from living in a manner that brings glory to His Name, they will find themselves positioned on the wrong side of the battle. What do you do when you find yourself charting your own course because you refused to trust in God's promises? God says if you belong to Him, He will get you out! Suddenly all your new plans, new friends, new truths, new opinions that you formed in the flesh will leave you standing all ALONE on the wrong side of the battle and something will rise up in your heart that says get me out of here! God is calling His church to rise up and go after everything that the enemy has taken from us until we recover all.

title: The Battle Within
description: It is a prevalent fact that many believers are completely ignorant of how we are at war.  There is a spiritual war waging around us at all times and many of us need to engage in this battle.  The problem is that we first have to win the battle within.  We have to allow grace to have its perfect work in our lives, we have to believe that God loves our souls and sent his son to die for them.  Ron Reed discusses how too many people view Christianity as a passive experience, and points out how the Devil will devour and pick off stragglers very easily when they fail to engage in the Spiritual warfare against their own inner voice or soul.  A strong exhortation is given to actively engage in a devotional life with God that encompasses meditation on the word and prayer.  He also discussed how one of the principle weapons the enemy uses against us is speculation.

title: The Christian Life: A warfare
description: This message was delivered on 05/01/1955. The enemies attack on the Christian will be in four main areas:  Our relationship with the Father. Relationship with the world. Relationship with the Church. Attack on the body. The enemies strategy is to rob the Christian of a "warring spirit". God wants us to maintain a warring spirit toward our enemy.

title: The Devil is After One Thing in Your Trial
description: Starting in Heb. 12, proceeding to Matt. 27:39-49 and a few other scriptures, the most intense spiritual attack ever made on any one was made on the Son of God. Pastor Conlon shows how we can learn from our Savior how the enemy attacks and what he wants most is to steal our confidence in the faithfulness of God's promises.

title: The Shocking Reality of Spiritual War
description: We are engaged in a spiritual war between God and the devil. If we live in ignorance or casual indifference, the enemy will take us captive. We need to learn the rules, wake up, grow up, stand up and fight.

title: The battle against the powers of darkness
We wrestle not against flesh and blood
When Heaven Decides to Fight
description: July 10, 2005 - When we finally say enough against the enemy the Lord will come to our defense and fight our enemies. We must begin to understand that God will answer the cry of His people. There is a season when God Almighty will arise to defend the rights of His own name. We are living in a time when God will fight for every soul who longs to be set free and follow after Christ.

title: When The Devil Cannot Touch You!
